1.name: Absolute Ruler
1.details:
Each time Justice casts an ability, he grants a stack of Absolute Ruler (maximum 4 stacks). At maximum stacks, his next regular ability will be enhanced.

He also gains additional magical power per stack.

2.name: God's Order
2.details:
Justice casts a powerful force in a target direction, after a brief delay, the energy will burst and deal magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit.

When enhanced, God's Order range, area of effect and damage are increased.

3.name: God's Will
3.details:
Justice sends an orb to a target area, creating an energy field upon arrival. After a brief delay, the field grabs onto all enemies on top of the area, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) and lowering their movement speed for a short duration.

When enhanced, God's Will deals more damage and roots the enemies instead.

4.name: God's Might
4.details:
Justice sends an orb in a target direction that explodes at an enemy Hero, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all surrounding enemies and granting him a shield (scaling with magical power) based on the amount of Heroes hit.

When enhanced, God's Might will create a powerful force that drags all nearby enemies to its centre a few seconds after the explosion.

5.name: Judgement
5.details:
Justice uses the ultimate power of the creation god, granting sight globally for the next few seconds.

Recasting the ability will release Judgement in a target area after a few seconds, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies within.

Enemies hit by the inner range of Judgement take more damage. The closer the target location is toward Justice, the faster he channels.
